item.title: [2x2] Battlefield Promotion
item.description:
Instant

Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. That creature gains first strike until end of turn. You gain 2 life.

item.title: [2x2] Hyena Umbra
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Enchant creature

Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has first strike.

Totem armor (If enchanted creature would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy this Aura.)

item.title: [2x2] Last Breath
item.description:
Instant

Exile target creature with power 2 or less. Its controller gains 4 life.

item.title: [2x2] Knightly Valor
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Enchant creature

When Knightly Valor enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 white Knight creature token with vigilance. (Attacking doesn't cause it to tap.)

Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has vigilance.

item.title: [2x2] Sensor Splicer
item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Artificer

When Sensor Splicer enters the battlefield, create a 3/3 colorless Phyrexian Golem artifact creature token.

Golem creatures you control have vigilance.

item.title: [2x2] Scale Blessing
item.description:
Instant

Bolster 1, then put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it. (To bolster 1, choose a creature with the least toughness among creatures you control and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)

item.title: [2x2] Relief Captain
item.description:
Creature — Kor Knight Ally

When Relief Captain enters the battlefield, support 3. (Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to three other target creatures.)

item.title: [2x2] Forbidden Alchemy
item.description:
Instant

Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.

Flashback {6}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

item.title: [2x2] Capture Sphere
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)

Enchant creature

When Capture Sphere enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature.

Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

item.title: [2x2] Aven Initiate
item.description:
Creature — Bird Warrior

Flying

Embalm {6}{U} ({6}{U}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a token that's a copy of it, except it's a white Zombie Bird Warrior with no mana cost. Embalm only as a sorcery.)

item.title: [2x2] Nephalia Smuggler
item.description:
Creature — Human Rogue

{3}{U}, {T}: Exile another target creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under your control.

item.title: [2x2] Makeshift Mauler
item.description:
Creature — Zombie Horror

As an additional cost to cast this spell, exile a creature card from your graveyard.

item.title: [2x2] Kasmina's Transmutation
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Enchant creature

Enchanted creature loses all abilities and has base power and toughness 1/1.

item.title: [2x2] Carrier Thrall
item.description:
Creature — Vampire

When Carrier Thrall dies, create a 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature token. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}."

item.title: [2x2] Liliana's Elite
item.description:
Creature — Zombie

Liliana's Elite gets +1/+1 for each creature card in your graveyard.

item.title: [2x2] Disfigure
item.description:
Instant

Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.

item.title: [2x2] Strands of Undeath
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Enchant creature

When Strands of Undeath enters the battlefield, target player discards two cards.

{B}: Regenerate enchanted creature.

item.title: [2x2] Skeleton Archer
item.description:
Creature — Skeleton Archer

When Skeleton Archer enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to any target.

item.title: [2x2] Severed Strands
item.description:
Sorcery

As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.

You gain life equal to the sacrificed creature's toughness. Destroy target creature an opponent controls.

item.title: [2x2] Fiery Fall
item.description:
Instant

Fiery Fall deals 5 damage to target creature.

Basic landcycling {1}{R} ({1}{R}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

item.title: [2x2] Living Lightning
item.description:
Creature — Elemental Shaman

When Living Lightning dies, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

item.title: [2x2] Lava Coil
item.description:
Sorcery

Lava Coil deals 4 damage to target creature. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.

item.title: [2x2] Kruin Striker
item.description:
Creature — Human Warrior

Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, Kruin Striker gets +1/+0 and gains trample until end of turn.

item.title: [2x2] Hissing Iguanar
item.description:
Creature — Lizard

Whenever another creature dies, you may have Hissing Iguanar deal 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.

item.title: [2x2] Titan's Strength
item.description:
Instant

Target creature gets +3/+1 until end of turn. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

item.title: [2x2] Purphoros's Emissary
item.description:
Enchantment Creature — Ox

Bestow {6}{R} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.)

Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 and has menace.

item.title: [2x2] Grapple with the Past
item.description:
Instant

Mill three cards, then you may return a creature or land card from your graveyard to your hand.

item.title: [2x2] Deadly Recluse
item.description:
Creature — Spider

Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

item.title: [2x2] Might of Old Krosa
item.description:
Instant

Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. If you cast this spell during your main phase, that creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn instead.

item.title: [2x2] Auger Spree
item.description:
Instant

Target creature gets +4/-4 until end of turn.

item.title: [2x2] Coiling Oracle
item.description:
Creature — Snake Elf Druid

When Coiling Oracle enters the battlefield, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a land card, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put that card into your hand.

item.title: [2x2] Call to the Feast
item.description:
Sorcery

Create three 1/1 white Vampire creature tokens with lifelink.

item.title: [2x2] Glowspore Shaman
item.description:
Creature — Elf Shaman

When Glowspore Shaman enters the battlefield, mill three cards. You may put a land card from your graveyard on top of your library.

item.title: [2x2] Ground Assault
item.description:
Sorcery

Ground Assault deals damage to target creature equal to the number of lands you control.

item.title: [2x2] Mayael's Aria
item.description:
Enchantment

At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control if you control a creature with power 5 or greater. Then you gain 10 life if you control a creature with power 10 or greater. Then you win the game if you control a creature with power 20 or greater.

item.title: [2x2] Qasali Pridemage
item.description:
Creature — Cat Wizard

Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

{1}, Sacrifice Qasali Pridemage: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

item.title: [2x2] Privileged Position
item.description:
Enchantment

({G/W} can be paid with either {G} or {W}.)

Other permanents you control have hexproof. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

item.title: [2x2] Sultai Soothsayer
item.description:
Creature — Naga Shaman

When Sultai Soothsayer enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.

item.title: [2x2] Winged Coatl
item.description:
Creature — Snake

Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)

Flying

Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

item.title: [2x2] Livewire Lash
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Equipped creature gets +2/+0 and has "Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell, this creature deals 2 damage to any target."

Equip {2}

item.title: [2x2] Traveler's Amulet
item.description:
Artifact

{1}, Sacrifice Traveler's Amulet: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

item.title: [2x2] Emiel the Blessed
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Unicorn

{3}: Exile another target creature you control, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.

Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {G/W}. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on it. If it's a Unicorn, put two +1/+1 counters on it instead. ({G/W} can be paid with either {G} or {W}.)

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/feature/double-masters-2022-release-notes-2022-06-24

item.title: [2x2] Leonin Arbiter
item.description:
Creature — Cat Cleric

Players can't search libraries. Any player may pay {2} for that player to ignore this effect until end of turn.

https://twitter.com/Wizards_MagicBR/status/1540016840373575680

item.title: [2x2] Emiel the Blessed
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Unicorn

{3}: Exile another target creature you control, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.

Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {G/W}. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on it. If it's a Unicorn, put two +1/+1 counters on it instead. ({G/W} can be paid with either {G} or {W}.)

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/feature/double-masters-2022-release-notes-2022-06-24

item.title: [2x2] Disciple of the Ring
item.description:
Creature — Human Wizard

{1}, Exile an instant or sorcery card from your graveyard: Choose one —

• Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays {2}.

• Disciple of the Ring gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

• Tap target creature.

• Untap target creature.

item.title: [2x2] Surgical Extraction
item.description:
Instant

({B/P} can be paid with either {B} or 2 life.)

Choose target card in a graveyard other than a basic land card. Search its owner's graveyard, hand, and library for any number of cards with the same name as that card and exile them. Then that player shuffles.

item.title: [2x2] Ob Nixilis, Unshackled
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Demon

Flying, trample

Whenever an opponent searches their library, that player sacrifices a creature and loses 10 life.

Whenever another creature dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Ob Nixilis, Unshackled.

https://youtube.com/watch?v=2_CJVtNbxLQ

item.title: [2x2] Twinflame
item.description:
Sorcery

Strive — This spell costs {2}{R} more to cast for each target beyond the first.

Choose any number of target creatures you control. For each of them, create a token that's a copy of that creature, except it has haste. Exile those tokens at the beginning of the next end step.

https://mobile.twitter.com/MagicOnline/status/1540031943831703553

item.title: [2x2] Alesha, Who Smiles at Death
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Warrior

First strike

Whenever Alesha, Who Smiles at Death attacks, you may pay {W/B}{W/B}. If you do, return target creature card with power 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped and attacking.

item.title: [2x2] Coiling Oracle
item.description:
Creature — Snake Elf Druid

When Coiling Oracle enters the battlefield, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a land card, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put that card into your hand.
